title: 36-Color Crayons for Toddlers 1-3 and Kids 4-8, Non-Toxic Washable Crayons, Ultra-Silky Easy-Grip Art Supplies, Ideal Coloring Gift for Boys and Girls
features: 36 Vibrant Colors: JUPITEARTH crayon set features 36 toddler crayons, 3 sticker sheets, and a paintbrush. These bright colors help toddlers learn about colors, spark their imagination, and boost creativity—perfect for all their artistic creations

Non-Toxic & Washable Crayons: Crafted with safe, odorless ingredients and meeting EN-71-3 and ASTM D-4236 standards, these crayons are perfect for kids ages 1-4. They’re designed for easy cleanup—just wipe away any marks from skin, furniture, or clothes—so your child’s creativity can flow without limits or mess (Tips: If it gets too messy, just use a mild detergent to clean it easily.)

Easy-to-Grip & Twist: Designed for tiny hands, these toddler crayons feature a unique design that keeps kids engaged while developing fine motor skills. Made from durable, eco-friendly plastic, they resist breaking and detachment, and their innovative twist action makes creative play even more fun. Plus, they're kind to the planet, reducing environmental impact

120 Free PDFs: Scan the QR code on the packaging to download 120 coloring pages. These pages include 10 fun themes, ranging from simple to more challenging, helping children gradually improve their drawing skills

Silky & Durable: The crayons have a buttery-smooth texture and are easy to color with, allowing kids to glide effortlessly across the paper. The portable design makes it easy to store and carry, while the reinforced casing can withstand impacts and drops
description: Product Description Previous page Next page How do I clean it? Simply wipe with water. If any marks remain, add a small amount of laundry detergent and gently scrub to clean it easily. What is the brush in the set used for? This brush is ideal for watercolor painting. When dipped in water, it creates a soft blending effect, transforming your artwork into a watercolor masterpiece. Let your baby unleash their creativity and explore new skills. Are they easier for small hands to grip? Yes, these crayons are designed for tiny hands with a unique grip that keeps kids engaged while developing fine motor skills. Are the colors vibrant and long-lasting? Yes, these crayons feature 12 vibrant colors that help spark toddlers' imagination and boost creativity. The silky and durable crayons have a buttery-smooth texture and are easy to color with. Why do these crayons feel different from traditional ones, with a texture similar to oil pastels? With a water-soluble formula, these crayons offer an oil pastel-like feel. Pair with a brush to create watercolor effects and spark creativity. Their smooth texture allows kids to draw vibrant art effortlessly while being gentle on little hands.
